name: House on Top of the Mountain
name_original: House on Top of the Mountain
description:
Play as Seyra, and enter the mysterious house on top of the mountain. Seyra is a young woman in search of the whereabouts of her grandfather who mysteriously disappeared when she was young. Explore the house and discover what secrets it holds. Face your fears as you encounter enemies and unlock new abilities through scattered equipment.

The House on top of the Mountain is a 2D-platformer with metroidvania-elements set in a gothic castle environment, created by 7 passionate students at Södertörns University during the course of 8 weeks as a school project.

Rebecka Johansson - Art Director & Artist

Daniel Stenholm - Artist

Elsa Thunberg - Artist

Sebastian Liljare - Artist

Anton Eriksson - Programmer & Sound Designer

Emil Bokstam Wilhelm - Programmer

Olle Karlson Reutercrona - Programmer

Minimum system requirements
  • Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Core i3-3250 or Ryzen 3 3250u
  • DX10, DX11, DX12 capable graphics card
  •  4 GB RAM
  •  100 MB available disk storage
